The Dry Riverbed at Shichijo

(七条河原) (Shichijō kawara)

Performance: January 1972: The Loyal Samurai

Production: January 1972

Narrators:

Toyotake Sakitayū (豊竹咲大夫)

Shamisen (Musicians):

Tsuruzawa Kanotarō (鶴澤叶太郎)
